SELECT t1.thumbs_id AS thumbsId, t1.res_id AS resId, t1.res_type AS resType, t1.user_id AS userId, t1.thumbs_status AS thumbsStatus, t1.create_time AS createTime, t2.nickname AS nickName, t2.username AS userName, t2.headimgurl AS headimgUrl FROM busi_resources_thumbs t1 LEFT JOIN busi_user t2 ON t2.user_id = t1.user_id WHERE t1.thumbs_status = 1

and t2.nickname like CONCAT('%', #{nickName},'%')

and DATE_FORMAT(t1.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and t1.res_type = "YL"
and t1.res_type = "SP"
ORDER BY t1.create_time
